description: Add and update data in CrateDB

essential_properties.name: query
essential_properties.description: The SQL query to execute. You can use n8n expressions or $1 and $2 in conjunction with query parameters.

essential_properties.name: schema
essential_properties.description: Name of the schema the table belongs to

essential_properties.name: table
essential_properties.description: Name of the table in which to insert data to

essential_properties.name: schema
essential_properties.description: Name of the schema the table belongs to

essential_properties.name: table
essential_properties.description: Name of the table in which to update data in

essential_properties.name: updateKey
essential_properties.description: Comma-separated list of the properties which decides which rows in the database should be updated. Normally that would be "id".
